record.title: PROGRAM

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, as previously announced, there are no rollcall votes Monday. However, Members should be prepared for votes throughout the week.
Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
